checks.description: This check verifies if the RO has a persintance identifier ['w3id.org', 'doi.org', 'purl.org', 'www.w3.org']
checks.explanation: The identifier (ro-crate-metadata.json) of the root data entity is not persistent. The identifier should be store in any of this [w3id.org, doi.org, purl.org, www.w3.org]
checks.title: (Meta)data are assigned a persistent identifier

checks.description: This check verifies if the the following minimum metadata ['author', 'license', 'description'] are present in the ro-crate
checks.explanation: The ro-crate contains the following metadata ['author', 'license', 'description']
checks.title: Data are described with rich metadata

checks.description: This check verifies that the hasPart elements exists and are describe in the ro
checks.title: Metadata clearly and explicitly include the identifier of the data they describe

checks.description: This check verifies if the RO use a FAIR context (schema.org)
checks.title: (Meta)data use vocabularies that follow FAIR principles

checks.description: This check verifies whether the RO has a licence. It also checks that there is a licence in RO parts
checks.title: (Meta)data are released with a clear and accessible data usage license

checks.description: This check verifies that: Dataset has an author, datePublished and citation. Files has an author. Ontologies has an author and citation and other types has an author.
explanation: The File chipseq_20200910.json do not have author
The Dataset results/ do not have datePublished, citation
The File nextflow.log do not have author
The File .nextflow.log do not have author
The CreativeWork ro-crate-metadata.json do not have author
checks.title: (Meta)data are associated with detailed provenance

score.description: Description of the way of calculate the score
